item.title: CVE-2024-35632|2024-06-04T17:34:04.598Z -- crm%20perks. -- integration%20for%20contact%20form%207%20and%20constant%20contact
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CRM Perks. Integration for Contact Form 7 and Constant Contact.This issue affects Integration for Contact Form 7 and Constant Contact: from n/a through 1.1.5.
